kizuna_health_d_01:
Hey there! Come on in! Everyone’s welcome in
the nurse’s office![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh! [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! I’m glad
you’re here![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_03:
I have some good news! You’re not gonna
believe this, but...[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_04: I passed the health teacher certification exam![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_06:
I saw you pushing yourself real hard with your
Treasure Hunt, and that really inspired me.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_07:
Of course, MOST of the credit for my success
goes to my own hard work, though! Hehe.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_08:
Thanks for giving me the push I needed to try
again, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_09:
Buuut they tell me there’s no room to add new
classes this year![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_10: So I guess I’ll keep being Nurse Miriam for a bit![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_11:
Just you wait, though! I’ll be standing in front of
a class at this academy before you know it.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_12:
Then I’ll teach you all you need to know
about health![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_13:
I bet I’ll make a great teacher. I can’t wait to see
you in my class![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_d_system_01: You formed a close bond with Nurse Miriam!
